name: SPLIT (itch) (jaydeDash)
description:
SPLIT - A short game about solving puzzles while being in two places at once.

SPLIT is a puzzle game made in 48 hours for the GMTK2021 Game Jam, with the theme being 'Joined Together'. This game intends to relate that theme to joining two characters with different limitations together. You play as Subject 7, a purple blob with the ability to split in two,  with the unfortunate catch of not being able to fully control both parts when separated. There is a 5 level tutorial and a 10 level campaign, which takes approximately 15 minutes to complete.
